content:
DropShadowEffect Class

In this Article

A bitmap effect that paints a drop shadow around the target texture.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class DropShadowEffect : System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • DispatcherObject
  • DependencyObject
  • Freezable
  • Animatable
  • System.Windows.Media.Effects.Effect
  • DropShadowEffect

Constructors summary

DropShadowEffect()

Initializes a new instance of the DropShadowEffect class.

Fields summary

BlurRadiusProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.BlurRadius* dependency property.
ColorProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Color* dependency property.
DirectionProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Direction* dependency property.
OpacityProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Opacity* dependency property.
RenderingBiasProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.RenderingBias* dependency property.
ShadowDepthProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.ShadowDepth* dependency property.

Properties summary

BlurRadius

Gets or sets a value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.
Color

Gets or sets the color of the drop shadow.
Direction

Gets or sets the direction of the drop shadow.
Opacity

Gets or sets the opacity of the drop shadow.
RenderingBias

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.
ShadowDepth

Gets or sets the distance of the drop shadow below the texture.

Methods summary

Clone()

Creates a modifiable clone of this Effect object, making deep copies of this object's values. When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
CloneCurrentValue()

Creates a modifiable clone of this Effect object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
CreateInstanceCore()

Constructors

  • DropShadowEffect()

    Initializes a new instance of the DropShadowEffect class.

    public DropShadowEffect ();

Fields

  • BlurRadiusProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.BlurRadius* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty BlurRadiusProperty;
  • ColorProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Color* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty ColorProperty;
  • DirectionProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Direction* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty DirectionProperty;
  • OpacityProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.Opacity* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty OpacityProperty;
  • RenderingBiasProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.RenderingBias* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty RenderingBiasProperty;
  • ShadowDepthProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect.ShadowDepth* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty ShadowDepthProperty;

Properties

  • BlurRadius

    Gets or sets a value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect.

    public double BlurRadius { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Double

      A value that indicates the radius of the shadow's blur effect. The default is 5.

  • Color

    Gets or sets the color of the drop shadow.

    public System.Windows.Media.Color Color { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Color

      The color of the drop shadow. The default is stem.Windows.Media.Colors.Black*.

  • Direction

    Gets or sets the direction of the drop shadow.

    public double Direction { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Double

      The direction of the drop shadow, in degrees. The default is 315.

  • Opacity

    Gets or sets the opacity of the drop shadow.

    public double Opacity { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Double

      The opacity of the drop shadow. The default is 1.

  • RenderingBias

    Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality.

    public System.Windows.Media.Effects.RenderingBias RenderingBias { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • RenderingBias

      A RenderingBias value that indicates whether the system renders the drop shadow with emphasis on speed or quality. The default is RenderingBias.

  • ShadowDepth

    Gets or sets the distance of the drop shadow below the texture.

    public double ShadowDepth { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Double

      The distance of the drop shadow below the texture. The default is 5.

Methods

  • Clone()

    Creates a modifiable clone of this Effect object, making deep copies of this object's values. When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.

    public System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect Clone ();

    Returns

    • DropShadowEffect

      A modifiable clone of this instance. The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object. The clone's stem.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen* property is false.

  • CloneCurrentValue()

    Creates a modifiable clone of this Effect object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.

    public System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowEffect CloneCurrentValue ();

    Returns

    • DropShadowEffect

      A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's stem.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen* property will be false even if the source's stem.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen* property was true.

  • CreateInstanceCore()
    protected override System.Windows.Freezable CreateInstanceCore ();

    Returns

    • Freezable

      To be added.
